channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Error Log Viewer by BestWebSoft
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Error Log Viewer by BestWebSoft

item.title: CVE-2021-24966|2024-08-03T19:49:14.380Z -- unknown -- error%20log%20viewer%20by%20bestwebsoft
item.description: The Error Log Viewer WordPress plugin through 1.1.1 does not validate the path of the log file to clear, allowing high privilege users to clear arbitrary files on the web server, including those outside of the blog folder

item.title: CVE-2021-24761|2024-08-03T19:42:16.647Z -- unknown -- error%20log%20viewer%20by%20bestwebsoft
item.description: The Error Log Viewer WordPress plugin before 1.1.2 does not perform nonce check when deleting a log file and does not have path traversal prevention, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin delete arbitrary text files on the web server.

item.title: CVE-2023-6821|2024-06-04T17:17:08.590Z -- unknown -- error%20log%20viewer%20by%20bestwebsoft
item.description: The Error Log Viewer by BestWebSoft WordPress plugin before 1.1.3 contains a vulnerability that allows you to read and download PHP logs without authorization

item.title: CVE-2023-6821|2024-08-02T08:42:07.513Z -- unknown -- error%20log%20viewer%20by%20bestwebsoft
item.description: The Error Log Viewer by BestWebSoft WordPress plugin before 1.1.3 contains a vulnerability that allows you to read and download PHP logs without authorization
